name: STOCKS
description:
After recently being made redundant from your old cubicle job, you decide to take up daytrading with your redundancy check, alongside the rest of your savings.

Who knows? You could be pretty good at it...

A short experiment made for LD48. You have 200 turns to make as much money as possible.

Audio by James Rodgers - @JamesRodgers25

SFX by Kenny

Controls:
  • Left arrow to SELL SELL SELL SELL
  • Right arrow to BUY BUY BUY BUY
Known Issues:

SFX can be quite delayed in the HTML5 build - please download for the best experience.
